com.zendesk.sdk.network.impl

Class ZendeskService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zendesk.sdk.network.impl.ZendeskService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZendeskHelpCenterService, ZendeskRequestService, ZendeskSdkSettingsService, ZendeskUploadService

    public abstract class ZendeskService
extends Object
    Abstract class for all Zendesk services that use Retrofit as a transport layer.

    • Method Detail

      • getRestAdapter

        protected retrofit.RestAdapter getRestAdapter(String zendeskUrl)
        Gets a RestAdapter instance that can be used to create services.

        The RestAdapter is set up by default to deserialise combined date and time in ISO 8601 format. Deserialisation will be carried out in UTC but dates deserialised from JSON will be in local representations of that time.

        Parameters:
        zendeskUrl - The url of your Zendesk instance, like "https://{subdomain}.zendesk.com"
        Returns:
        A RestAdapter that will be used for controlling serialisation and deserialisation.
        See Also:
        ISO_8601 on Wikipedia
